DOC.detailed_description: The objective study determine whether reduction blood flow stair-stepping cycling ergometer leg exercise contribute improvement whole body exercise capacity submaximal exercise endurance patient mild congestive heart failure . Two group 25 patient mild moderate CHF , age 30-70 , train 12 week . The experimental group train pressure cuff inflate one thigh low leg exercise . The cuff apply alternate leg training , leg duration ischemic training . The control group train similar duration intensity without pressure cuff legs . Pre post training measure include VO2peak , exercise duration 30 % VO2peak , 6 minute walk test , Minnesota Living Heart Failure questionnaire
